title: Outdoor Playground, Wood Like Flooring
posting_body: ['One Bedroom Units: $300 Security Deposit with Approved Credit', 'Two Bedroom Units: $400 Security Deposit with Approved Credit', 'Estrella Apartments Homes', '7050 Pecos St, Denver, CO, 80221', 'Follow This Link for More Information:', '<URL>', 'Call Now:', 'show contact info', 'x 40', 'OR Text', '40', 'to', 'show contact info', 'to contact us.', 'Welcome Home to Estrella Apartments Homes', 'This is a 2 Bedroom, 1 Bath, approximately 825 Sq.', 'Ft.', 'At Estrella Apartments, our homes feature charming living spaces with modern designs and fixtures and plenty of natural light.', 'You can enjoy entertaining friends or simply a peaceful respite from busy city living.', 'You will have access to a beautiful, sparkling swimming pool, and a picnic area with BBQ stations, as well as a community playground.', 'We also offer a fully equipped fitness center and a convenient business center.', 'Our dedicated management staff is here to give you the finest apartment living experience in Colorado – Denver apartments that thrill and amaze at every turn.', 'Come and see what makes Estrella different, and allow us to take you on your private tour today!', 'Features', '- Newly Renovated 1- and 2-Bedroom Homes', '- Modern Appliance Package', '- Elegant Ceiling Fans in every Home', '- Heat & Air Conditioning', '- Wood Like Flooring', 'Community Amenities', '- Bike Racks Throughout Community', '- On-Site Laundry Facility in each Building', '- Elevators', '- Fitness Center', '- Futzol Court', '- Business Center', '- Sparking Swimming Pool with Community BBQ Grilling Area', '- Pet-Friendly Community', '- On-Site Management with Courtesy Package Acceptance, 24-Hour Emergency Maintenance, and On-Call Courtesy Patrol', '- Outdoor Playground', 'Office Hours', 'Monday-Friday:10:00AM-6:00PM', 'Saturday:10:00AM-5:00PM', 'Pet Policy', 'We love your pets and are excited to welcome them to their new home!', 'We allow two pets per apartment home with a combined weight not exceed 160 lbs.', 'Cats and dogs are welcome at our community although some breed restrictions apply.', 'Pet Deposit for 1 Pet: $100', 'Pet Fee for 1 Pet: $250', 'Monthly Pet Rent for 1 Pet: $35', 'Pet Deposit for 2 Pets: $200', 'Pet Fee for 2 Pets: $400', 'Monthly Pet Rent for 2 Pets: $65', '1EHRmf6RC']
